title: Damn straight
author: VD
content_html: Never much liked Stereopony, and I’d put Scandal above Doll$boxx, but they definitely got the #1 band right. They’re just spectacularly good. Even the soft poppy new song is well-written and has got the big chorus as well as a nice bass line.
content_text:
Never much liked Stereopony, and I’d put Scandal above Doll$boxx, but they definitely got the #1 band right. They’re just spectacularly good. Even
the soft poppy new song
is well-written and has got the big chorus as well as a nice bass line.
